title: Requires providers of health care policies to provide coverage for colorectal cancer early detection
summary: Requires providers of health care policies to provide coverage for colorectal cancer early detection for persons fifty years of age or older; requires the superintendent of insurance to provide notification to enrollees of such coverage via mail.

   18  AND

   21  ACCORD WITH THE MOST  RECENTLY  PUBLISHED  GUIDELINES  OF  THE  AMERICAN
